00003 Logging::Logging(int level, long baud) {
00004     _level = constrain(level,LOG_LEVEL_NOOUTPUT,LOG_LEVEL_VERBOSE);
00005     _baud = baud;
00006 }

00009 void Logging::Init(){
00010     Serial.begin(_baud);
00011 }

00013 void Logging::Error(char* msg, ...){
00014     if (LOG_LEVEL_ERRORS <= _level) {   
00015                 print ("ERROR: ",0);
00016         va_list args;
00017         va_start(args, msg);
00018         print(msg,args);
00019     }
00020 }
00021 
00022 #if LOGLEVEL >= LOG_LEVEL_INFOS
00023 void Logging::Info(char* msg, ...){
00024     if (LOG_LEVEL_INFOS <= _level) {
00025         va_list args;
00026         va_start(args, msg);
00027         print(msg,args);
00028     }
00029 }
00030

00032 void Logging::Debug(char* msg, ...){
00033     if (LOG_LEVEL_DEBUG <= _level) {
00034         va_list args;
00035         va_start(args, msg);
00036         print(msg,args);
00037     }
00038 }

00041 void Logging::Verbose(char* msg, ...){
00042     if (LOG_LEVEL_VERBOSE <= _level) {
00043         va_list args;

00053  void Logging::print(const char *format, va_list args) {
00054     //
00055     // loop through format string
00056     for (; *format != 0; ++format) {
00057         if (*format == '%') {
00058             ++format;
00059             if (*format == '\0') break;
00060             if (*format == '%') {
00061                 Serial.print(*format);
00062                 continue;
00063             }
00064             if( *format == 's' ) {
00065                                 register char *s = (char *)va_arg( args, int );
00066                                 Serial.print(s);
00067                                 continue;
00068                         }
00069             if( *format == 'd' || *format == 'i') {
00070                                 Serial.print(va_arg( args, int ),DEC);
00071                                 continue;
00072                         }
00073             if( *format == 'x' ) {
00074                                 Serial.print(va_arg( args, int ),HEX);
00075                                 continue;
00076                         }
00077             if( *format == 'X' ) {
00078                                 Serial.print("0x");
00079                                 Serial.print(va_arg( args, int ),HEX);
00080                                 continue;
00081                         }
00082             if( *format == 'b' ) {
00083                                 Serial.print(va_arg( args, int ),BIN);
00084                                 continue;
00085                         }
00086             if( *format == 'B' ) {
00087                                 Serial.print("0b");
00088                                 Serial.print(va_arg( args, int ),BIN);
00089                                 continue;
00090                         }
00091             if( *format == 'l' ) {
00092                                 Serial.print(va_arg( args, long ),DEC);
00093                                 continue;
00094                         }
00095 
00096             if( *format == 'c' ) {
00097                                 Serial.print(va_arg( args, int ));
00098                                 continue;
00099                         }
00100             if( *format == 't' ) {
00101                                 if (va_arg( args, int ) == 1) {
00102                                         Serial.print("T");
00103                                 }
00104                                 else {
00105                                         Serial.print("F");                              
00106                                 }
00107                                 continue;
00108                         }
00109             if( *format == 'T' ) {
00110                                 if (va_arg( args, int ) == 1) {
00111                                         Serial.print("true");
00112                                 }
00113                                 else {
00114                                         Serial.print("false");                          
00115                                 }
00116                                 continue;
00117                         }
00118 
00119         }
00120         Serial.print(*format);
00121     }
00122  }
